entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Saint-Jérôme
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
